name: DocMentors
overview:
DocMentors offers a range of documentation services to keep a company’s documents update and complete. It can deliver a wide range of documents including user education documents, which include content that will minimize support calls and enable readers to quickly become competent with their products or service.

DocMentor’s user-centered design strategy allows a company’s application to become highly usable and engaging by converting business requirements in to compelling user experience. The team analyzes user expectations, behaviors, needs, and goals in order to design contents and visual design for any desktop or web-based applications. With a thorough understanding, technical information is transformed in to knowledge that makes the product usage more interactive.

DocMentors work in user education documentation, marketing collateral (white papers, brochures etc.), data visualization and social media strategy. A proper work methodology is put in practice by gathering and organizing business requirements, understanding customers and their requirements, working with client’s engineers and stakeholders to determine ways to enhance the product usage and lastly, providing clear and crisp documentation, compelling interface, and strong online presence of all products or services. DocMentors help companies achieve customer satisfaction through value feedback, winning products and loyal customers.

DocMentors uses social networking and search engine optimization techniques to allow companies get noticed, retain customers and continue growing. The team, with a proven track record of performance, has given so far a crystal-clear picture of client organizations and made sure of a remarkably different from the rest.
